product.title: Meadow Teal Roman Blind
product.description: Beautiful botanicals in a graduating teal palette inspired by the changing skies and greek countryside, who wouldn't want that hanging at their window? This clarissa hulse design is a bouquet of wild flowers and leaves. Each clematis, quaking grass and wild oat is picked out in r beautiful botanicals in a graduating teal palette inspired by the changing skies and greek countryside, who wouldn't want that hanging at their window? This clarissa hulse design is a bouquet of wild flowers and leaves.

relproducts.title: Rimini Azure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

relproducts.title: Rimini Turquoise - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

relproducts.title: Rimini Powder Blue - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Sapphire Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm sapphire blue is a beautiful colour, and works erfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm sapphire blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dark teal blue is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dark teal blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This rich midnight blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This light brittany blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This light blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Valencia Cobalt Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The versatility of the blue fabric is stunning. The dark blue tones can be paired with steel & wooden finishes for a modern twist or as a perfect complement to whites and further shades of blue in more traditional interiors.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Velvet Royal Blue Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in royal blue, introduces a deep dark blue to your home.

relproducts.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Ruby Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The blooming meadow linen ruby roman blind is full of texture, colour, pattern and warmth, and makes a remarkable window dressing for many many schemes. Warm shades such as this work effortlessly with darker natural grains, whilst the linen mix fabric gives it a helping hand, the blooming meadow linen ruby roman blind is full of texture, colour, pattern and warmth, and makes a remarkable window dressing for many many schemes.

relproducts.description: Such intricate detailing in this clarissa hulse design. Meadow storm is inspired by the beautiful botanicals of the greek countryside, with wild allium, quaking grass and clematis picked out in an intense array of storm grey tones. Grey is obviously incredibly easy to pair with t such intricate detailing in this clarissa hulse design.

relproducts.description: Add a burst of colour to your home with this beautiful botanical meadow design by clarissa hulse. The deconstructed bouquet features wild flowers and grasses found in the greek countryside, with the bright coral tones reflecting the colours of the setting sun. relproducts.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Blue Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Soft, light and creamy, the blooming meadow linen blue is perfect for adding sophisticated charm to your home. It has a lovely open weave that adds endless texture too. And with natural influences, this blind works wonders in a similar scheme. Plenty of foliage, organic shade soft, light and creamy, the blooming meadow linen blue is perfect for adding sophisticated charm to your home.

relproducts.title: Blooming Meadow Linen Amethyst Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Bold amethyst, zesty citronella, elephant grey and neutral blush. The blooming meadow linen amethyst roman blind has a wonderfully diverse colour palette that works wonderfully together. The oversized pattern fills your room with energy and flare, whilst the soft neutral shad bold amethyst, zesty citronella, elephant grey and neutral blush.

relproducts.title: Summer Meadow Blossom Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This summer meadow blossom roman blind brings elegant style in the most delicate of ways. A quaint design in quaint colours. The milkshake pink shade might be the one that pops, but take a closer look and you'll find a touch of soft mint nestled amongst the greys too.

relproducts.title: Summer Meadow Magenta Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Magenta can be seen as quite a daring and brash colour, but on this summer meadow design, it works just wonderfully, especially with the hints of yellow alongside it too. The stony coloured neutral keeps the theme grounded, with the monochrome details making it a versatile bl magenta can be seen as quite a daring and brash colour, but on this summer meadow design, it works just wonderfully, especially with the hints of yellow alongside it too.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Pistachio - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: On a taming cream base sit the wild meadow pistachio's watercolour-style florals, in vintage blue, muddy mustard, and gentle green, forming an artistic and creative vibe. When curved into the tempered arches of the roman, the pattern takes on a new, more scattered vibe, providing the look with character and personality. Hang the pistachio in your home workspace or art studio, where the soft colours will both calm and inspire.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Magenta - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Teaming bright fuschia with pretty indigo and sage green, the wild meadow magenta is true to its name, bringing to mind endless fields of wildflowers and grasses. The softness of the roman style only adds to this rural feel, and the fabric is backed with a fade-protective lining to make this blind last. The magenta will work beautifully as part of a traditional bedroom scheme in a country cottage or manor.

relproducts.title: Wild Meadow Ruby - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: On a stone cream canvas sit dainty wildflower illustrations in whites, mustards, and reds, in the country chic wild meadow ruby. The gentle, flowing feel of the fabric is matched by the drapes of the roman, producing a soft and sumptuous window covering, suitable for any home. Invoke a feeling of rustic rurality in your kitchen by using the ruby to complement sage green and cream surroundings. Accent with mustard yellows and pure whites, with the occasional pop of red, for a coherent and coordinated look.
